name: Jailbreak Simulator
description:
Jailbreak Simulator is a jailbreak game where prisoners must make other prisoners in the cell, fight against the police, avoid the trap, and get the key to escape the prison.

At the beginning of the game, the player plays only one inmate, then slowly finds a partner, attacks the police, avoids the police's attack, and finally how to open the hidden treasure chest?
